title: SuperFruits
content:
Can anyone ID this - it looks a bit like Avant Garde with modified 'R's... is this a custom job?

Apologies for the awful pic quality - taken on a 1st-gen-iPhone...

Many thanks

Si

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012155717im_/http:/typophile.com/files/superfruits_6088.jpg)
author: Duckworth

comments.content: Rainer, I've returned the favor and fixed your link for you.

Duh \*smacks forehead\*  
You're quite right! Thankyou for pointing that out, I'm not used to seeing the glyphs with the open R.
